description: Contains detailed components comprising an address.

primaryNumber.description: The house, PO Box, or building number.

streetPredirection.description: Directional information before a street name, e.g. N, SW.

streetPostdirection.description: Directional information after a street name, e.g. N, SW.

streetSuffix.description: Abbreviated value describing the street, e.g. St, Ave, Blvd.

secondaryNumber.description: Apartment or suite number, if any.

cityName.description: The accepted/proper name of the city.

defaultCityName.description: The default city name for the address. This field will not be present if the default city name is equal to the value of the city name field.

stateName.description: The full state or territory name.

plus4Code.description: The 4-digit add-on code (more specific than 5-digit ZIP).
